content:
[basic explain]
500px范围内队员的物理和魔法攻击力 +40
500px范围内队员的独立攻击力 +64

[if]
    [change status]
        `hp`
        `>`
        `%`    0
        `end`
[/if]

[then]
    [target]
        `party`    500
    [stat by condition]
        `equipment physical attack`
        `+`    40
    [stat by condition]
        `equipment magical attack`
        `+`    40
    [stat by condition]
        `separate attack`
        `+`    64
[/then]
